price: Orang-orang yang mengatakan kepada saudara-saudaranya dan mereka tidak turut pergi berperang, "Sekiranya mereka mengikuti kita, tentulah mereka tidak terbunuh".  Katakanlah, "Tolaklah kematian itu dari dirimu, jika kamu orang-orang yang benar".
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡ وَقَعَدُواْ لَوۡ أَطَاعُونَا مَا قُتِلُواْۗ قُلۡ فَٱدۡرَءُواْ عَنۡ أَنفُسِكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna qālū li-ikh'wānihim waqaʿadū law aṭāʿūnā mā qutilū qul fa-id'raū ʿan anfusikumu al-mawta in kuntum ṣādiqīna
